Xiaomi Smartphones

This list contains 549 Xiaomi Smartphones in India. This price list was last updated on Feb 10, 2024.

Top 3 Xiaomi Smartphones are as follows:
  1. Xiaomi Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G: 128 GB inbuilt, 6.67 inches, Android v13, 5100 mAh Battery with 67W Fast Charging, Wi-Fi
  2. Xiaomi Redmi Note 15 Pro: 5G, 6.74 inches, Dimensity 8020, Wi-Fi, 3G
  3. Xiaomi Redmi Note 13 Pro Plus: 256 GB inbuilt, NFC, VoLTE, Memory Card Not Supported, 8 GB RAM
